main.name: Liam Goring
main.description: Dedicated, driven, and loves a challenges
main.bio: I am a software developer based in Winnipeg, Manitoba with a passion for crafting. Lately I have been working with Angular and Node in Typescript. I also have a love for writing and exploring this amazing world of computing as it evolves. Check out my Medium articles for some of my thoughts.
main.contactmessage: If you would like to contact me about a possible project please reach out via LinkedIn
